name: Geodude

ability.name: Sturdy
ability.effect: If Geodude has no damage counters on it, reduce any damage it takes above 30 to 30, and it cannot be Knocked Out.

attacks.name: Smack Down
attacks.effect: If the Defending Pokemon resists Ground Type, this attack ignores resistance and deals 20 more damage.

flavor: Strong arms let it adapt well to flying foes. A tossed stone can catch other Pokemon unaware.
